SEARCH
Module org.example.scdpro2
Package org.example.scdpro2.business.models.BPackageDiagarm

Class PackageClassComponent

java.lang.Object
org.example.scdpro2.business.models.Diagram
org.example.scdpro2.business.models.BPackageDiagarm.PackageClassComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PackageClassComponent extends Diagram
Represents a class component within a package diagram. Each PackageClassComponent is associated with a PackageComponent (its parent) and contains properties such as name, visibility, coordinates, and relationships to other package class components. It provides validation for name and visibility and allows rendering and code generation.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • xCoordinates

      public double xCoordinates
      The X-coordinate position of the class component in the diagram. This is used for rendering the class component at the correct position.

    • yCoordinates

      public double yCoordinates
      The Y-coordinate position of the class component in the diagram. This is used for rendering the class component at the correct position.

    • width

      public double width
      The width of the class component, used for rendering and layout purposes.

  • Constructor Details

    • PackageClassComponent

      public PackageClassComponent(PackageComponent parent, String name, String visibility)
      Constructs a new PackageClassComponent with the specified parent, name, and visibility. It validates the name and visibility, and initializes the class with default coordinates.
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent package component containing this class component.
      name - The name of the class component.
      visibility - The visibility of the class component, either "+", "-", or "#".
